title: Prototipe Automated Storage and Retrieval System
description: A prototype of an automatic storage and retrieval system that can work efficiently and quickly

title: Alat Pendeteksi Kebisingan Pada Perpustakaan Berbasis Internet Of Things
description: A device that can detect noise with output in the form of LCD, and can monitor and control via an application in the form of a telegram.

title: Kendali Tinggi Air Tangki Menggunakan PID Diskrit dan Sensor Ultrasonik.
description: A system that can control the water level in accordance with the desired set point based on pid control that has been carried out.
